entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:17 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:17 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
